hints.content: Each tick mark on the number line represents one minute.

$1{:}05$ is $5$ minutes after $1{:}00$. 

![The number line goes from 0 to 60 with marks at every 10 minutes. 0 is labeled 1:00 and 60 is labeled 2:00. Marks divide the space between each number into 10 equal parts. The label 1:05 is at the fifth mark to the right of 0.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c5ee37509b7bd22991888f171b48147b42fef737) 

So, we move $5$ tick marks past $1{:}00$.

This number line shows $1{:}05$ graphed:

![The number line goes from 0 to 60 with marks at every 10 minutes. 0 is labeled 1:00 and 60 is labeled 2:00. Marks divide the space between each number into 10 equal parts. Point A is labeled at the fifth mark to the right of 0.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8a874e834d22c533d61f3c13ebb045e4fd4398fd)

question.content:
**On which number line is $1{:}05$ graphed?**
